modShortDescription: Folks may know this from JaWoodle's "Anywhere, Anytime" series. It creates random wandering hordes, of a random amount of zombies, a random amount of times per day.
modDescription:
Folks may know this from JaWoodle’s “Anywhere, Anytime” series. It creates random wandering hordes, of a random amount of [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/), a random amount of times per day. How often (in terms of in-game hours) and how many zombies are configurable in the blocks.xml included in the mod. **IMPORTANT NOTE:** The wandering horde mod is only for vanilla! It is not for DF.

This is a C# Mod (cannot be server only, EAC must be off!).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsHarmony/tree/main/KHA20-WanderingHordePatch)**

If you appreciate KhaineGB’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
